metadata.title: CVE-2019-14466 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The GOsa_Filter_Settings cookie in GONICUS GOsa 2.7.5.2 is vulnerable toPHP objection injection, which allows a remote authenticated attacker toperform file deletions (in the context of the user account that runs theweb server) via a crafted cookie value, because unserialize is used torestore filter settings from a cookie.

criterions.comment: gosa package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
